# Case Normalization Test

URLs should be normalized for scheme and domain case sensitivity.

## Various Case Formats

Official documentation is available [1] and also linked as [1].
The same resource appears in different formats [1], [2], and [2].

## Mixed References

Referencing the docs [1], [1], [1], [2], and [2] throughout
the document shows how case variations are handled.
<!-- mdcitefix:refs -->
[1]: HTTP://EXAMPLE.COM/docs
[2]: HTTPS://EXAMPLE.COM/docs
